Title: Requires the state to pay for independent autopsies of incarcerated individuals who die in custody
Summary: Requires the state to pay for independent autopsies at the request of the next of kin of incarcerated individuals who die in the custody of the department of corrections and community supervision.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring the state to pay for independent autopsies of incarcerated individuals who die in custody
